bnmr 0.0.0.9001
  • Reference

Base Rate

Source: R/base_rate.R
base_rate.Rd

This function allows you to obtain current Base Rates and Base Lending Rates for retail loans or financing facilities and Indicative Effective Lending Rates for a standard housing loan/home financing offered by financial institutions from the BNM API.

base_rate(bank_code = NULL)

Arguments

bank_code

8 characters of SWIFT code per https://api.bnm.gov.my/

Source

https://api.bnm.gov.my/

Examples

base_rate()
#>    bank_code                                                 bank_name
